title: AEC Syndrome: Epidemiology and Population Prevalence
short_description: Clinical document describing the epidemiological characteristics and rarity of AEC syndrome, affecting fewer than 100 documented cases worldwide.
long_description: This clinical research document provides epidemiological information about AEC syndrome, a rare genetic disorder that affects both males and females equally. The document highlights the limited understanding of the condition's exact incidence and prevalence in the general population, emphasizing its rarity with fewer than 100 affected individuals documented in medical literature. This information is valuable for healthcare professionals and researchers studying rare genetic conditions and understanding the scope of AEC syndrome in clinical practice.
